articles.title: Only way for Korean nation to survive
Japanese reactionaries' suppression of Chongryon under fire
articles.content:
Japanese reactionaries' suppression of Chongryon under fire 
    Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A workers' rally was held at the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Factory yesterday to denounce the Japanese reactionaries for their crackdown upon the central and local headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
 Speakers at the rally denounced the Japanese reactionaries' crackdown upon Chongryon as an undisguised criminal move to destroy Chongryon, a dignified organization of overseas citizens of the DPRK, and an outrageous violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK.    
 If the Japanese authorities persist in their anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon campaign despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, they will have to pay a very high price and will be entirely to blame for the ensuing consequences.
